attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT YOU OUR GOVERMENT TO BRING OUR ARMED FORCES HOME FROM AFGANISTAN FAR TO MANY ARE KILLED BECAUSE THEY DO NOT HAVE THE CORRECT EQUIPMENT TO FIGHT THIS WAR AND IT NEVER WILL
